annonstext:
We at Sigma Connectivity in Linköping are growing and are currently looking for skilled engineers to join us in our developer teams. We think that you are passionate about software development and the Android Platform and you have a solid experience in the Framework layer of the Android Operating System (not just de application layer).
The teams are working with everything from the lower layers of the Android framework, including Linux drivers and in to the java framework layer. The ideal engineer has previously worked in at least one off the Android stack bellow the application layer. You will be part of our strong development team that work together with different sites within Sigma Connectivity and works with high profile customers.

Documented experience with Android development
Experience with AOSP (Android Open Source Project)
Embedded C/CC++
Linux
Development tools like Git, Gerrit, Jenkins
Android applications experience a plus
Experience with hands-on development and troubleshooting on embedded targets
Understanding of operating system fundamentals

Team player
Proactiveness in collaborating and execution
Flexibility to switch technical context
Willingness to learn new methods / tools / processes
Ability to prioritize and multitask
Strong problem solving and critical thinking skills

Sigma Connectivity is a unique consultant company and we run most of our projects in-house. We have a strong team-based setup and you will never work alone. You will have access to cutting edge technology through our close cooperation with platform vendors and 3rd party companies.
The Sigma Connectivity culture is about sharing experiences and knowledge and we will encourage you to develop and grow your competence and skill with new challenges.
